transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Settings
Studio Settings

1 min
with onprintshop designer studio, you can personalize all kinds of products create new designs or edit by reducing design costs per order, dependency on graphic designers, approval time, etc with the option of converting offline designs into online templates using the studio setting you can personalize your product design with no technical skills required all the settings here create a user friendly interface, thus allowing customers to easily create designs for their products in general, we have divided the studio settings into seven tabs – general setting, top panel settings, left panel settings, elements setting, canvas setting, image section setting, and block studio settings also, we have provided option to review and configure the studio settings as common, product type and product specific settings follow the document to understand the various settings of designer studio to change the studio's look, feel, and functional setting
Did this page help you?
